column1: Title: "HIV Stigma | 2018 | 2019 | United States | All races/ethnicities | Both sexes | Ages 13 years and older | All transmission categories"
Weighted percentages for unstable housing or homelessness and median HIV stigma scores are reported in the ‘Rate per 100
column2: 000’ column with corresponding 95% confidence intervals reported in the ‘Rate LCI’ and ‘Rate UCI’ columns within the Charts and Maps tools or in parentheses within the ‘Rate per 100

column1: To allow for comparison with other HIV indicators
column2: data are presented for persons aged ≥13 years and aged 13-24 years. However
column3: these estimates are representative of persons with diagnosed HIV aged ≥18 years and 18-24 years

column2: estimates with a coefficient of variation ≥0.30 or those based on a denominator sample size less than 30 were suppressed. For HIV stigma
